review: Absolutely amazing! Way better than Apple TV. What is truly phenomenal is the speed at which it processes all of the commands. Videos load up incredibly quick and navigating through it couldn't be simpler. Also, all of my family pictures and videos are available on the big TV. Yes, I know a lot of other hardware can do that, but none that easily and quickly. The Voice Control on the remote is...well, you just have to try it to see for yourself. Accurate, fast, convenient. I already ordered the Gaming Controller and can't wait to make it work even better. Get yourself one. And no, I am not being paid by Amazon to say this. It is also the very first review I have ever posted. It just deserved it, that's all.
author: Robert Nicotra

review: Uncomplicated and visually appealing, Amazon Fire TV makes watching television exciting again.  Gone are the endless advertisements of products I neither need nor care about.  I have the choice of naming specific programming and films or browsing through the library and taking my chances.  I have caught up on many missed films and revisited some classics.  I highly recommend Amazon Fire TV!
author: Linda Puckett
